## RumGlobal.setUser() method

Set user information to all events, stored in `@usr`

See <a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/real%5C_user%5C_monitoring/browser/advanced%5C_configuration/#user-session" target="_blank" rel="noopener">User session</a> for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setUser(newUser: User & {
        id: string;
    }): void;
```
